synopsis.text: Wuzhang Plains' formidable strategist, Zhuge Kongming, reincarnates in the vibrant Shibuya City, Tokyo, after yearning for a peaceful life during his final moments in ancient China. Adapting to the modern world, Kongming encounters Eiko Tsukimi, an aspiring musician, and forms an unlikely alliance. With Eiko's guidance through the complexities of contemporary life and Kongming's tactical prowess, they embark on a mission to conquer the unforgiving music industry. Witness their journey unfold in the historical fantasy timeslip comedy, Ya Boy Kongming, which premiered on March 31, 2022.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
